Package tilt.handler

These classes handle the various types of REST request (PUT,DELETE,GET,POST) and also specific services, such as returning images referred to on HTMLpages (TiltImageHandler) and GeoJson (GeoJsonHandler).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GeoJsonHandler
    Handle an Ajax request for geoJson data about a picture
    TextIndex
    An index into the uploaded HTML, recording the positions of each plain text word, number of words etc.
    TiltDeleteHandler
    Handle a DELETE request
    TiltGetHandler
    Handle a GET request for various image types, text, GeoJSON
    TiltHandler
    Abstract super-class for all handlers: PUT, POST, DELETE, GET
    TiltImageHandler
    Handles requests for various image types, including linked images
    TiltPostHandler
    Handle a POST request
    TiltPutHandler
    Handle a PUT request (used for update)

Package tilt.handler Description

These classes handle the various types of REST request (PUT,DELETE,GET,POST) and also specific services, such as returning images referred to on HTMLpages (TiltImageHandler) and GeoJson (GeoJsonHandler).
